data.name: Space Worthy
data.detailed_description:
Atompunk science simulator

Build spaceships, build electronic and other scifi machines. Live as a rogue space scientist.

You were on the school trip to science camp planet, but unfortunetly, your ship had some strange issues and exploded apon arival, Now you are stranded on the planet and you have to use the science camp's educational courses in the way it was not intended to save your injured crewmates and escape the planet. Use reward parts to build electronic devices, so you can find rest of your crew and get back home.

We will make you Space Worthy!

Is the slogan of Science Camp in the story mode. You will be be taught how to build machines, how to craft basic items for survival, how to navigate in space, how to fly a spaceship and keep it operational. It will prepare you for what is next, the survival mod (In development).
But for now, junkyard planet can be accessed after you finish the story,. You can salvage shipwrecks for parts and build whatever you want. After you successfully build your spaceship, you can challenge hostile ships in battle. waiting for you on planet's orbit.
data.about_the_game:
Atompunk science simulator

You were on the school trip to science camp planet, but unfortunetly, your ship had some strange issues and exploded apon arival, Now you are stranded on the planet and you have to use the science camp's educational courses in the way it was not intended to save your injured crewmates and escape the planet. Use reward parts to build electronic devices, so you can find rest of your crew and get back home.

Is the slogan of Science Camp in the story mode. You will be be taught how to build machines, how to craft basic items for survival, how to navigate in space, how to fly a spaceship and keep it operational. It will prepare you for what is next, the survival mod (In development).
But for now, junkyard planet can be accessed after you finish the story,. You can salvage shipwrecks for parts and build whatever you want. After you successfully build your spaceship, you can challenge hostile ships in battle. waiting for you on planet's orbit.
data.short_description: Space Worthy is atompunk science simulator. Use science to save the crew of your wrecked ship. This was supposed be holiday for young scientists on scientific educational pkanet. Now you really have to learn something if you want to get back. Find new parts, learn how to use them, build electronics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64Bit
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
